Notes.Text:
gimp was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2016-4994: Use-after-free vulnerabilities in the channel and layer properties parsing process (bsc#986021).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the xcf_load_image function in app/xcf/xcf-load.c in GIMP allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (program crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted XCF file.
